double edu.ou.asgbook.core.LatLon.distanceInKms ( LatLon  other  )  

00032                                              {
00033         double lat1 = Math.toRadians(this.lat);
00034         double lat2 = Math.toRadians(other.lat);
00035         double lon1 = Math.toRadians(this.lon);
00036         double lon2 = Math.toRadians(other.lon);
00037         
00038         // double R = 6371; // spherical earth radius
00039         double lat0 = (lat2+lat1)/2;
00040         double a = 6378.137; // WGS-84
00041         double f = 1.0/298.257223563;
00042         double esq = f*(2-f);
00043         double R=a * (1-esq)/Math.pow(sq(1-esq*(Math.sin(lat0))),1.5);
00044         
00045         double dlon = lon2 - lon1;
00046         double dlat = lat2 - lat1;
00047         double term = sq(Math.sin(dlat/2)) + Math.cos(lat1) * Math.cos(lat2) * sq(Math.sin(dlon/2));
00048         return (2 * R * Math.asin(Math.min(1,Math.sqrt(term))));
00049     }
